values:
There's a thousand different songs that have impacted me emotionally.
But there are also those few that will stick with you for years, and this is them:

And All That Could Have Been
Right Where It Belongs
A Warm Place
by Nine Inch Nails. Trent Reznor, truly, is a musical genius


You Are Loved (Don't Give Up)
by Josh Groban. Sometimes the ones that leave the most impact are the simplest.


Theme for the Blood and the Life Eternal
by Neverending White Lights. This song gives me chills, flashbacks, tears, everything. It's a truly amazing song.

One Man Drinking Games
by Mayday Parade.

The Messenger
Release
by The Tea Party.

Snuff
by Slipknot. There is, literally, no better breakup song.

Because I Can
by Katy Rose.


Each of these songs demands a different emotional reaction from me. They are beautiful, heartbreaking, and heartwarming.
Give them a listen. =)

96 DAYS.

Rise Against.
Sarah Edan Bud.


Dope shit?
I think so.

I love her more than any friend I've ever had, truly. (With an exception, obviously.)
I value her friendship like no other, and I trusted her implicitly.
So I don't understand why she would go against everything that comes from her mouth to hurt me the way she has. I know it was never the intention.
But then what were the intentions?
Date the person I wanted and be happy with me never knowing? Was I supposed to jump for joy and hold you in all your glowing contentment? Was this even thought through?
Did you even ask whether I would do this to you?
No, you didn't, because you know the fucking answer.
You betrayed me like I was someone you never even cared for. This is something you do to a petty stranger, not your best friend. Friends.
And now it's like she doesn't even care anymore. Like she is just too willing to give up and lose me.
Lose me.
What happened to never letting that happen? What the fucking hell happened?
What happened to fighting? What happened to a meaningful apology and NOT playing the victim in this?
Because you, my love, most definitely are not.
This is a consequence of what you did not think through, and I'm not going to apologize for it. I have no reason to.
It's going to take so long to heal completely from this state you have put me in.
You fucking shattered any trust I had in anyone anymore, because I promised myself you would never hurt me.
You of all people. I expected it from him. But not you.
Never you. Never. 

I don't trust anyone. I won't let ANYONE in. I don't tell anyone anything and I can feel this bitterness in me just suffocating.
Do you know how many fucking tears I've shed over this? Red and clear?
Do you fucking know how many fucking scars this has inflicted? Emotional and physical?
The fucking expectations both of you held over my head like a bone to a dog?
JUST GET OVER IT KAYTI, SO WE CAN BE HAPPY.

I don't think you do.

But I digress.
I am  bigger person than to let such a fickle situation rule my life.
And I fucking refuse to let such a selfish asshole control my heart.
So I've taken the biggest step I wasn't ready to take - I fucking jumped it.
I'm over him. Of course I love him, but I am not in love with him.
I will never be again, ever. It's a good thing, and a huge weight lifted from my chest. I'm over holding a resentment towards this, because it's not doing anything constructive for me. I only need to tend to my wounds, and heal myself, FOR myself.
And that will simply lead the rest to pass.
My anger will dissipate, and slowly dull to nothing. I will never shed another fucking tear over this.
I don't fucking deserve it.
Just know, bb, you will never hurt me again.
Ever.



I hope our friendship can mend itself, now. Before it dies.
Because I do love you, and I truly do not know what would happen to me were I to lose you.
I don't ever want you to leave my life. Either of you, really. You've both helped me through life's most painful shits. 
But you've hurt me too, and as much as you need to live with that, as do I.

They've redone the whole thing! The whole soundtrack to Nightmare before Christmas!
  1. "Overture" (DeVotchKa)
  2. "Opening" (Danny Elfman) 
  3. "This Is Halloween" (Marilyn Manson)
  4. "Jack's Lament" (The All-American Rejects)
  5. "Doctor Finkelstein/In The Forest" (Amiina)
  6. "What's This?" (Flyleaf)
  7. "Town Meeting Song" (The Polyphonic Spree) 
  8. "Jack and Sally Montage" (The Vitamin String Quartet)
  9. "Jack's Obsession" (Sparklehorse)
  10. "Kidnap the Sandy Claws" (Korn) 
  11. "Making Christmas" (Rise Against)
  12. "Nabbed" (Yoshida Brothers)
  13. "Oogie Boogie's Song" (Rodrigo y Gabriela)
  14. "Sally's Song" (Amy Lee) – 3:02
  15. "Christmas Eve Montage" (RJD2)
  16. "Poor Jack" (Plain White T's)
  17. "To the Rescue" (Datarock) 
  18. "Finale/Reprise" (Shiny Toy Guns)
  19. "Closing" (Danny Elfman)
  20. "End Title" (The Album Leaf) 

It's actually really amazing. I love all of it. Very much. <3

I drift away to a place,
Another kind of life.
Take away the pain,
I create my paradise.
Everything I've held has hit the wall -- 
What use to be yours isn't yours at all.

Falling apart and all that I'm asking,
Is it a crime? Am I overreacting?

Oh, he's under my skin.
Just give me something to get rid of him.
I've got a reason now to bury this alive,
Another little white lie.

So what you had didn't fit among the pretty things.
Never fear,never fear,
I now know where you've been.
Braids have been un-tied.
As ribbons fall away,
Leave the consequence
My tears you'll taste.

Falling apart and all that I question,
Is this a dream or is this my lesson?

Oh, he's under my skin.
Just give me something to get rid of him.
I've got a reason now to bury this alive
Another little white lie..

I don't believe I'll be alright,
I don't believe I'll be okay,
I don't believe how you throw me away.

I do believe you didn't try.
I do blame you for every lie.
When I look in your eyes, I don't see mine.

Oh, he's under my skin.
 Just give me something to get rid of him.
I've got a reason now to bury this alive,
Another little white lie..

Oh!
My permission to sin,
You might have started my reckoning.
I've got a reason now to bury him alive.
Another little white lie...

" Omnipotent, omniscient, benevolent.
Omnipotent simply means “having all power” “capable of doing everything and anything.”
If God is omnipotent, then we cannot explain the existence of pain, suffering, misery and evil by saying that God was just not strong enough to stop them from happening.
Omniscient means “all-knowing.”
If God is omniscient,
we cannot explain away the evil in the world by saying that God just did not know about it,
but would have done something if He had only known.
Benevolent means “wishing good” or “intending to do good.”
If God is benevolent,
then we cannot explain the evil in the world by saying that God just doesn’t care about us,
or even actively wants us to suffer.
And there it is.
As Epicurus said, i
f God is willing to prevent evil (benevolent) but not able, then He is not omnipotent.
If He is able (omnipotent) but not willing, then He is no benevolent.)
And, though Epicurus does not add this, since many philosophers consider omniscience just a part of omnipotence,
if God is able to prevent evil and willing to prevent evil,
then He must not know about it,
in which case he is not omniscient.
What can a faithful Christian, Jew or Muslim possibly say in response to this challenge? "

Motherfuckin' hardstyle, bitch.
<3

They were broken. They were perfect. They were nothing at all.
Forever lost in a life-long second; the moment his heart disappeared.
Time stopping as her words fell to the floor, a bittersweet memorial of his loss.
Eyes staring, hands shaking;
He watched her – her legs, her hips, her back –
As she walked away; turning the final page to his chapter.
And she felt the emptiness she was leaving behind, the sudden hole she had just spoken into the universe,
And she knew he would never be the same, that they would never be the same –
But she continued walking anyways.
For her heart was already full with someone elses passion, and she had no room for another.
She was complete, she was whole.
And he was suddenly, shatteringly
Empty.

I miss you so much.
And I only just realized.
This is like, a physical fucking pain.
I love you; you mean the world to me.
And to you, I am just someone you know from last summer.
Just Katie.
I fucking hate how we fell apart,
and how you more or less forgot me. 
It rips and tears. 
I want it to go back to the way it was.
I was your bestriend. 
You were mine. You ARE mine. 


...Just, fuck. Words aren't working.

I can't get this across properly.
This isn't a "omfg lolz i hasnt seen you in foreveeerrrr" miss.

I miss you to the depths and hollows of my bones, in my soul.

I feel empty, like there is a hole where you should be.

So, woke up about 10:30 this morning, which is uncharacteristically early for me. 

I skulked around for a bit, got bored, and went back to bed. XD
I woke up again, went online and talked to Katrina. Took a shower, got all pretty,
and then she came here before we were going to the movie (The Dark Knight, first time for her, second time for me.)
It's amazing. <3
But yeah, so we went on the computer for a bit, to check times for buses and movies,
and I had my head in her lap, and she was playing with my hair.
And whenever someone plays with my hair, or strokes my head, I like, instantaneously fall asleep.
So, my eyes were closed and all of a sudden, she was like, "So, do you have a reason this time?"
And I was confused at first, because I didn't know what she was talking about.
And then I remembered. 

On Sunday morning, she tried to kiss me, and I turned my head.
I HAD MORNING BREATH, OKAY? IT WOULD HAVE BEEN GROSS.

So, I played dumb and was like, "Huh?"
"For me to kiss you...?"

And...of course, her being the first girl I have kissed, I got really nervous, and I think my heart was about to explode, and so I hid
my face in her chest and mumbled, "Noooo..."

And so she pulled my head back gently, and kissed me. =) 

It was an awkward angle, so then she forced me to move so that she could kiss me properly.
It was amazing.
She makes me so happy...
And I love that she likes me for me, and that she loves holding me. <3
I'm too affectionate. XD

Other than the following:

I AM FUCKING ANGRY AS ALL MOTHER FUCKING HELL
SERIOUSLY, I AM GLAD I AM SO FAR AWAY FROM HIM BECAUSE IF I WEREN'T
I WOULD ACTUALLY BE ON MY FUCKING WAY TO GUILDFORD WITH A SHOVEL AND LIME.
I FUCKING HATE YOU, LOGAN, FOR MAKING HER FEEL THIS WAY AND MAKING ME
THIS ANGRY AND FOR STIRRING UP SUCH SHIT. YOU ARE A PATHETIC
EXCUSE FOR A BOY, AND I HOPE YOU DROWN IN A TUB OF PIG LARD, YOU
FAT FUCKING PIECE OF SHIT.
YOU SAY YOU AREN'T SCARED OF ME, AND I WARNED YOU.
YOU SHOULD BE TERRIFIED OF ME, BECAUSE YOU HAVE NO FUCKING IDEA WHO I AM OR WHO I KNOW.

And quite frankly, if I didn't want to kill you, I could have you, your family and everyone you cherish killed.
With a phone call.
I truly suggest you watch you fat-pig-fucking back, asshole.
And I only warn you because it's the right thing to do.
You should know that when you walk alone at night, there is a high chance you may not make it to wherever you are going. =)

I'M NOT FUCKING HAPPY FOR YOU I DONT FORGIVE YOU I HATE YOU SO MUCH
FUCKING ASSHOLE FUCKINGSHIT. 

I don't care about you're fucking girlfriend. 
At all, I don't care how cute she is or that she loves your friends and doesnt mind you smoke pot.
BECAUSE I WAS THE SAME. 
EXACTLY.

I was so happy and then I had to go and and talk to you.
She is amazing, and likes me for me and makes me so happy.
And then you fucking come along and trample all of that, you fucking bastard.
I thought I was over you, god-fucking-dammit.
This just fucking puts things back. 
JUST FUCK. 

I don't know whether I'm angry or sad or scared or what.
I just know I want to fucking break shit.

I think I found a girl. 
Maybe? I'm not sure.
But she is harsh adorably and I'm hanging out with her tonight for the fireworks. :3
And she is staying at Mandy's house tonight too..
I'm excited, but at the same time really nervous.
What if I actually date her?
First REAL relationship in three years. 
My stomach is in knots.
What if she sees me and thinks I'm disgusting...
What if the "just friends" thing happens again, like always?

I think I'm over thinking harshly. What if I don't even like her?
I'm just gonna wait for after tonight to happen...=)

Starlight dances around hazel clouds of lost,
where nightmares reflect against the dark,
from which I cannot hide. 
And sleepless nights are restless, always fighting for attention --
bruising me with purple crease; a beacon to the world, 
wailing: "I'm broken, I'm broken!" 

I walk amongst the living, to hide the gash that
ever-so-neatly bleeds from within, 
leaving me pale and drawn and empty, a corpse,
unfit to step where I do.

I breathe to hold my breath in waiting,
and though my lungs scream and claw, not only for oxygen,
but happiness and life and love,
I sit, a shell of who I once was, listless.
Watching the moments pass by until I dance with angels of lost causes.
Hoping, dreaming and waiting.
Always waiting.
For you.

Fuck everyone and everything.
Fuck you and you and you.
Fuckfuckfuck.

I'm a fucking failure. 
I dont think I have ever been this angry at myself, ever.
Im just going to go and drown myself in the toilet, now.
Ta.

Watch your fucking mouth, bastard.

Keep the fucking thing shut before I shut it for you.

I'll tear at your vocal chords,
And I'll cut your tongue out,
Then sew your lips together.

I'll break your heart,
Then I'll stab you in it,
Then rip the fucking thing out.

I'll break your nose and step on your feet.

I'll break all your fingers,
And your toes.

I'll shove your knee caps around the back of your legs.

I'll kick you in the balls,
Then cut them off.

I'll cut at your arms till you can't see,
I'll shove pills down your throat till you can't think,
I'll pour alcohol down your throat till you can't speak.

And then, I'll scream in your face.

I'll call you names,
And tell you you're worthless.


Then, maybe, you'll understand how badly you hurt me

Sometimes, I do wonder. 
I wonder what would have happened
if my parents hadn't split. 
I wonder what my relationship would be like with my father,
had he not become a crack addict. 
I wonder, will I ever become anything?
Something with a shred of importance?
Or will I follow my parents footsteps?

I thought of it once. 
It terrified me. 
And I don't know if that is a good thing, or a bad thing. 

I wonder, will I ever become beautiful?
Do my friends really consider me a friend?
Does my best friend truly consider me a best friend?
Will I know any of them in 20 years?
I cannot bear the thought of not.

Will I accomplish the things I want?
Why do I have such an issue trusting people?
Is my love returned?


Somtimes, I do wonder.
What the fuck is wrong with me?

Why is it that
everytime someone finds out something
personal about you,
you have to justify it to them?
No matter how insignificant they are?

Fuck that.
I'm not justifying anything to you.
Or anyone like you.
Because you are no one to me.
Nothing but a simple acquaintance.
And by the time the drama
That we call highschool is over,
I won't even remember you exsist.

So, do not ask me questions,
dear acquaintance.
Because you are not important enough to have them answered.
You are nothing more than a name to me.
And if I want to rung around shirtless.
Screaming, "God loves ugly."
I can bloody well do so.
Because you are no one to me.
Nothing more than a moment in time.

I am so hungover right now goddamn. 
Anyways. My night was so interesting.
I loved it. 


So, we went to Rhonda's moms and we hung out there for a while. I spent most of my time in the shop with the adults because the kids are little shits. It was fun in there. Except when my mom would be like, "Get out, Everret is going do smoke weed." I was going to say, "You think I never have?" 
But no.
That would have ensued much trouble.

So, blah. But whatever. My mother is still super cool. She let me drink wine (a glass) and gave me butterscotch rum (SO GOOD) and I had this mudslide thinger (wow the affects from that thing) and then I had a sip of Kalua. hmm, yummy. 

I was only slightly buzzed when they decided they [the adults] were going to go to a club. Obviously, if not unfortunately, I couldn't go, so Shirley drove me home. But before I left, I stole Rhonda's vodka. The thing was fucking full. TEEHEE.

So, I got in the house and changed. Turned all the lights on and yeah. I called my friend Alex (new friend) and he came over with beer. BAWHAHA. So, ontop of everything I had at Rhonda's, I had almost a whole thing of Vodka to myself, and five beers. I have never been so drunk in my life. It was hilarious. Alex said I was funny. Good to know?
So, he went home and I was bored and decided to pick up the phone.

I feel sorry for all the people I phoned.
I tried phoning Jen a billion times and left hideous drunken messages on her machine. I am NOT looking foreward to when she finds them.
Then I tried to phone Ginnie because, well, she's great, and no one answered. 

THEN I PHONED 
cloen
DEARESTS HOUSE AND HER FATHER ANSWERED AND SAID, "ONE SECOND." AND THEN I WAS ON DRUNKEN HOLD FOR LIKE, FIVE MINUTES AND THEN HE HUNG UP ON ME. HMPH. 
Then, I phoned Edan. And she answered. By now it was like, 2 am. We established, on this phone call, that she is a lesbian, I was drunk, it was very late and I was sorry for waking her. Then I hung up and have not talked to her since. IM SORRY EDAN.

Anyways. Then, I hear a knock at the door and all that went through my head was "FUCKING SHIT I AM GONNA GET CAUGHT SHITFACED AND DIE." 
So, I ran around, turned off the TV (which, to me unknowingly, was playing PORN. WTF.), ran and hid the vodka, and then stumbled to let my mom and dave in. 
I went into my room, and then came the word vomit. It was a monstrosity.

I called my mom (who was SO DRUNK) in and she crawled into my room (possibly the most hilarious expierience of my life) and was on my floor laughing hysterically. So I told her I was drunk and she was like, "Oh dear HAHAHA." And then I crawled onto the floor with her and somehow (I think, I seriously cannot remember how this occured) scraped my knee. 
A bunch more of hilariousity ensued, like me telling them not to have wild crazy monkey sex because, yes, I could hear them and it was traumatizing and me and my mom discussing how to make the perfect get away after robbing a bank.

Then came the real vomit. I ran to the bathroom and barfed like, three times.
And once this morning.
Jesus. 
And now I have the worst hangover of my life. 

But my mom hasn't gotten mad at me. At all. It's so great.

The heart dies, a slow death,
shedding each hope like leaves...

  
                  
... until one day there are
none. No hopes. Nothing remains.

  
                  
She paints her face to hide her
face. Her eyes like deep water.

  
                  
It is not for Geisha to
want. It is not for Geisha to feel.

  
                  
Geisha is an artist
of the floating world.

  
                  
She dances. She sings. She entertains you,whatever
you want. The rest is shadows. The rest is secret.

I am skipping P.E in the library. It is fantastic and silent in here. I love it.
Possibly not going downtown with Edan tomorrow, due to the fact she is sick.
Hmm.
Didn't go out on Saterday, either. 
Why do all my plans seem to go to shit? Eurgh. 

Ahaha. It's so great. The Librarian doesn't even ask why I am in here. And if she did, she is so dumb i could just say i have a spare block, which we don't have till grade 12,
and she would buy it.
Idiot.


Anyways. I did come in here to do English homework.
Should start it now. 
Ta.

I am so incredibly worried about my mother, it is sickening.
I can't eat, I can't sleep. I feel empty.
Last night I cried for like, two hours. I swear I could hear my heart break. Something inside was hurting so bad.

Sometimes, I think it isn't so good for me to be as attached to my mother as I am.
But, I can't help it. She is the only one that has really stuck by me through everything. She would drop everything she is doing for me, and I know it. 

Ugh. She is probably coming home Monday, I think. I really hope she does. The house feels so bloody...incomplete without her. UGH UGH UGH

Anyways. Yeah. She is more than likely going to need an operation. My poor mommy. 

God. I know I am always saying, "I'm going to kill myself." as an idle threat to things I don't like. But, seriously. If my mother were to happen to die, I would fucking tweak.
I would go and find the nearest form of suicide and complete it. I don't really even think I would cry. It would just..simply be the first thing that would arise for me to do. Like, subconcious. 
Ick, this sucks. 
And I don't like my moms boyfriend staying with us.
He is nice and all...but very anti-social.
I need SOCIAL PEOPLE IN MY LIFE.
IF YOU DON'T TALK, PISS OFF.
